price: (Ẹ rántí Ànábì) Nūh, nígbà tí ó pe ìpè ṣíwájú. A sì jẹ́pè rẹ̀. A sì gba òun àti àwọn ènìyàn rẹ̀ là nínú ìbànújẹ́ ńlá.
arabic: وَنُوحًا إِذۡ نَادَىٰ مِن قَبۡلُ فَٱسۡتَجَبۡنَا لَهُۥ فَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُ وَأَهۡلَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلۡكَرۡبِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wanūḥan idh nādā min qablu fa-is'tajabnā lahu fanajjaynāhu wa-ahlahu mina al-karbi al-ʿaẓīmi
